author: gcrawford
msg: TRINIDAD-797 Date-picker does not use the converter's locale attribute if it differs from page locale
Patch provided by Yee-Wah Lee - thanks Yee-Wah.
1. Creates a scriptlet which loads a specified (named) locale.
2. Calls DateTimeConverter to load the scriptlet when a non-page locale is requested.

msg: HTTP default encoding is ISO-8859-1; use default encoding if blank
